text: (kan almuslimun fi 'awal 'amrihim mmnweyn min qital alkfar, mamurin bialsabr ealaa adhahm, falamaa balagh 'adhana almushrikin madah wakharaj alnabiu salaa allah ealayh wasalam min "mk" mhajrana 'iilaa "almdyn", wa'asbah lil'iislam qw) 'adhin allah lilmuslimin fi alqtal; bsbb ma waqae ealayhim min alzulm waledwan, wa'iina allah taealaa qadir ealaa nasarahum w'idhlal edwwihm
